data.what_is:
Dynosend is a customer engagement platform the helps product-led companies to grow faster by automating the process of acquiring, engaging and retaining customers. Send emails, SMS messages, Webhooks and more through visual building and continuously send data from your application using our powerful API.

Sales and marketing playbook building service is included.
data.product_description:
Dynosend is a customer engagement platform the helps product-led companies to grow faster by automating the process of acquiring, engaging and retaining customers. Send emails, SMS messages, Webhooks and more through visual building and continuously send data from your application using our powerful API.

Sales and marketing playbook building service is included.

initial_reviews.review_title: A splendid data-driven digital tool for customers!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dynosend?
The features provided by the dynosend for customers (especially email marketing, customer relationship management and automation).

What do you dislike about Dynosend?
Nothing. I will inform you whenever I will have any issues.

What problems is Dynosend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automated emails for business promotion. This technique helped me to approach and attract customers.
